programme.title: The history of US-Russia summits
programme.short_synopsis: What is the purpose of the American-Russian summits following the Cold War?
programme.medium_synopsis: Yeltsin and Clinton meet in Vancouver and Alistair Cooke considers the eventful history of US-Russia summits and what purpose they serve after the Cold War.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
